SummaryEnglish: Centered around a second-year high school paper rabbit, Rope, and a third-year high school paper squirrel, Akira-senpai. Depicts the daily life of two people who are somehow on good terms, Akira-senpai, who has an anxious skin but is smart, and Lope, who is constantly being swayed by such a senior. Daily troubles, encounters with people in downtown, worries, and encounters with the unknown! ? , a turbulent story in its own way in the time that passes leisurely.
